00021 
00022 #include <cppunit/CompilerOutputter.h>
00023 #include <cppunit/extensions/TestFactoryRegistry.h>
00024 #include <cppunit/ui/text/TestRunner.h>
00025 //
00026 #include <cstring>
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 #include <string>
00029 //
00030 
00031 extern std::string externalDataPath=".";
00032 
00033 /*! Gets the file name from the command line argument.
00034  *
00035  * @param argc The number of arguments
00036  * @param argv The command line arguments
00037  * @param i The index to the command line arguments array.
00038  * @return The file name from the command line.
00039  */
00040 std::string get_file(int argc, char *argv[], int &i)
00041 {
00042         std::string file = "";
00043         int j=i+1;
00044         while (j<argc && argv[j][0] != '-')
00045         {
00046                 file += argv[j];
00047                 if (j<argc-1 && argv[j+1][0] != '-')
00048                         file += " ";
00049                 ++j;
00050         }
00051         i = j-1;
00052         return file;
00053 }
00054 
00055 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00056 {
00057         int i=1;
00058         while(i<argc)
00059         {
00060                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-i") == 0)
00061                         externalDataPath = get_file(argc, argv, i);
00062                 ++i;
00063         }
00064 
00065         // Get the top level suite from the registry
00066         CPPUNIT_NS::Test *suite = CPPUNIT_NS::TestFactoryRegistry::getRegistry().makeTest();
00067 
00068         // Adds the test to the list of test to run
00069         CPPUNIT_NS::TextUi::TestRunner runner;
00070         runner.addTest( suite );
00071 
00072         // Change the default outputter to a compiler error format outputter
00073         runner.setOutputter( new CPPUNIT_NS::CompilerOutputter( &runner.result(), std::cerr ) );
00074         // Run the test.
00075         bool wasSucessful = runner.run();
00076 
00077         // Return error code 1 if the one of test failed.
00078         return wasSucessful ? 0 : 1;
00079 }
